class.name: GeographicLocationByIP
class.author: Matt Weber

input.name: trigger
input.description: The trigger port. The type of this port is undeclared, meaning that it will resolve to any data type.

output.name: geoCoordinates
output.description: Lattitude and longitude determined from this host's ip address.

class.description: This accessor, when fired, reads the geographic location of this host's ip address from freegeoip.net .
